⏺ Bash(ib list)
  ⎿  agent-abc123  running  5m  opus

❯ When you stop working, you must always end your message with either 'WAITING' or 'I HAVE COMPLETED THE GOAL'. IMPORTANT: Write your summary or status update FIRST, then put the status phrase as your FINAL line - nothing should come after it.

⏺ I understand. Let me continue working on the task.

⏺ Bash(ib look agent-abc123)
  ⎿  Worker is still processing the build.
